panels.description: Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "branch", "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND "pipeline" = 'periodic' AND  "job_name" =~ /.*ceph-nightly.*/)  AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Ceph Nightly Jobs

panels.description: Percentage of Ceph nightly jobs that are passing vs failing.

targets.query: SELECT count("result_num") FROM "build" WHERE ("passed" = 'True' AND "type" = 'upstream' AND "pipeline"='periodic' AND  "job_name" =~ /.*ceph-nightly.*/) AND $timeFilter

select count("result_num") from "build" where ( "passed" = 'False' and "type" = 'upstream' and "pipeline" = 'periodic' and result !~ /SKIPPED|NODE_FAILURE|TIMED_OUT|CANCELED|ABORTED|RETRY|RETRY_LIMIT|LOST|ERROR/  AND  "job_name" =~ /.*ceph-nightly.*/) and $timeFilter

panels.title: Ceph Nightly CI Stats

panels.description: Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND  "job_name" =~ /.*ceph-updates.*-master$/) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Ceph Daemon Promotion Pipeline - Scenario Jobs - Master

targets.query: SELECT "log_link", "duration", "result" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" = 'SUCCESS' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND  "job_name" =~ /.*promote-ceph-daemon.*-master$/) AND $timeFilter

panels.description: Click on individual job names to go to logs or on the patch number to see the gerrit review.

targets.query: SELECT "log_link", "duration", "result", "result_num" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" != 'SKIPPED' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND "result" != 'NODE_FAILURE' AND  "job_name" =~ /.*ceph-updates.*-wallaby$/) AND $timeFilter

panels.title: Ceph Daemon Promotion Pipeline - Scenario Jobs - Wallaby

targets.query: SELECT "log_link", "duration", "result" FROM "build" WHERE ("result" = 'SUCCESS' AND "type" = 'rdo' AND  "job_name" =~ /.*promote-ceph-daemon.*-wallaby$/) AND $timeFilter
